message: I propose a fair, 90/10 split. It's in our best interest to agree quickly before the money starts losing value!
Let's flip the script! I propose a 90/10 split in my favor, with the higher share going to me this time.  We can both benefit from this agreement before the value of the money drops further.
Okay, let's be reasonable.  I'm willing to give you a larger share this round, but we need to come to an agreement soon. The longer we wait, the less we both get.
